Coronal hole faces Earth Sunday, 11 July 2021 - 16:39 UTC




Coronal hole faces Earth Sunday, 11 July 2021 - 16:39 UTCA large northward extension of the southern hemisphere polar coronal hole is currently facing our planet.
Solar wind flowing from this large but patchy coronal hole could arrive at our planet tomorrow, 12 July. Active geomagnetic conditions (Kp4) are
possible with a slight chance of minor G1 (Kp5) geomagnetic storm conditions once the solar wind stream….
